title: Ranger of the North (18R55)

Game Text:	Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. Maneuver: If the fellowship is in region 1 or region 2, you may exert bearer to make him or her defender +1 until the regroup phase. Regroup: Discard this to heal a companion.
